storyInfo: After the misunderstanding has cleared up, the party learns they are in Big Bob's Originium slug ranch! What do his Originium slug beer and dishes taste like?

attributes.content: I still think something about this doesn't add up.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Laios! Is this really the time for that? Who knows when that orc will catch up to us?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't you have even a little sense of danger? This is uncharted territory! Nothing we know about the dungeon is going to help us here!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I didn't expect the slugs to have totally different habits and levels of aggressiveness just for having different shells.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But why were they working with that creature as strong as an orc? Are the slugs really intelligent enough to be tamed?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Shh—Pipe down. The orc is here.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Quietly) H-He's coming!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Quietly) What the—! Why is he attacking the slugs? Are they not on the same side?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Quietly) Is he attacking everything around him indiscriminately?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hold on... I have an idea.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: What are you up to this time?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hi.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I've had enough of this! If we're doing this, let's do it now!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Marcille, wait!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I'm not going to get myself killed here by some orc! Falin is still waiting for me to save her!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Scary Orc?

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Kill...? Why would I kill you?!
attributes.name: Scary Orc?

attributes.content: Do I look that scary?
attributes.name: Scary Orc?

attributes.content: Cut the crap!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hey, watch out—
attributes.name: Scary Orc?

attributes.content: And that's the last of them. It's always a pain when they start running around all over the place.
attributes.name: Scary Orc

attributes.content: I knew it. You're not a violent brute who attacks indiscriminately... You just wanted to take care of the slugs for us!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Not-So-Scary Orc

attributes.content: Hahaha, it's your first time here. No wonder.
attributes.name: Not-So-Scary Orc

attributes.content: You see, I own this little ranch here, and I built these huts with my friends. Took us a whole lot of work just to keep the Originium slugs under control.
attributes.name: Not-So-Scary Orc

attributes.content: You can call me Big Bob. You look like a bunch of wandering vagrants. The wastes are a dangerous place. You ought to rest up here.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Excuse me, vagrants?! We're adventurers.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Is there a difference?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Of course there is!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: So they're called Originium slugs...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You're kidding me. You've never heard of Originium slugs?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Oh, we haven't introduced ourselves yet, have we? I'm Laios. This is Senshi, the newest member of the party. And this is Marcille, a mage, and this is Chilchuck the locksmith.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Now that I take a look, you're all dressed kinda funny. Are you actors from Wrankwood?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Never mind... Bet you wouldn't get it even if I explained.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Anyway, most folks would know to stay away when they see so many slugs in one place. So why'd you come anyway? They thought you were intruders.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: So you raise these slugs here! That's incredible.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Heh, this is nothing. There are plenty of those little guys here. Rather than making enemies of 'em out in the wastes, I figured I'd try putting them to use.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: They always get more active this time of year. That's why I came out to the hut. Didn't expect to find you folks waking all of them up and leading them away though.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Seems like I'll have to knock 'em all out one by one and drag 'em back in.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Uh, sorry about that...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Haha, it's okay!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: So anyway... you mean they're edible?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Huh?! Are you crazy?! Do I have to remind you that they were trying to kill us just now?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: And this isn't the time to learn about local cuisines! We need to—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We do eat Originium slugs, though.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Laios & Senshi

attributes.content: They don't exactly seem domesticated...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Do they have some kind of unique flavor then?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Not quite. Rather than flavor, it's more like... eh, you should try 'em out yourselves! I'll whip up something for you.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: I can help.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What???
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Eat what? These slugs? No! No, no! Hell no!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I've cleaned the pot, Bob. I'd love to see how you cook the slugs.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Great, thanks! First things first: the slugs we just caught can't be eaten right away. Gotta flip 'em over and keep them in water for five days to starve them. Keeps their digestive tracts clean.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: What? You're saying we need to wait five days for this?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Ha, you'd starve first. Luckily I already prepared some earlier. Make sure you wear gloves. We'll boil them in water. That'll shrink the meat and make 'em easier to shell.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Why can't you just pry it off as is?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Because this way we can clean out all the mucus inside.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Just blanch them in the boiling water briefly and take them out. After that, we'll take the shell off and give the meat a rinse. See the mucus?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Ugh... Just like slimes...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: What? You haven't heard of slimes?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Slimes! Like, the super common monster on the upper levels of the dungeon.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: So once you remove the meat, you keep heating the shells in the water.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Hey! Don't just ignore me!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: As for the meat, there's still lots of mucus right now. We'll squeeze some lemons on it, then rub it hard with salt and flour to get all the mucus off.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Remove all the organs... Take off this membrane... And rinse it a total of five times.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: So we can't eat the organs or the membrane? I mean, slimes taste so good when eaten whole.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Feel free to give it a try, if you don't feel like waking up to see the sun tomorrow.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Now you finally put down the slug guts, huh?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Such a delicate cleaning process... Even I am not familiar with many ingredients that need to be prepared like this.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: They're Originium slugs. That makes 'em far more dangerous than most animals out there. There's no skipping this step.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: The ones I breed on my ranch may be raised in a controlled environment, but even they need to have their innards cleaned.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: If you run into any wild ones, don't even try to cook 'em. You could wash those slugs dozens of times and they still wouldn't be safe to eat.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Looks like a huge pain. Can we pick up the pace, please?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: No. Ingredients like these need to be handled carefully.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: After this step, we'll add some aromatic herbs to the water, like those thorny branches and leaves over there, and boil the slug in it again.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: More boiling?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What's the rush, long ears? That's how you get rid of the earthy scent and tenderize the meat.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: If you don't mind the smell, though, we can skip the aromatics.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Er, please continue.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Let's add as many chilis as we can. It'll be so spicy you'll feel like you can breathe fire. And then, more firewood. Keep those flames high!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: After that, we're pretty much done. We slice the meat, fry up a few more side ingredients, mix 'em up and start stir-frying. As soon as the meat starts to curl, it's done. Any longer, and it'll be too dry.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Remember, as soon as the meat starts to curl.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Whoops. Skipped a step. We should've drizzled some Originium slug beer onto the meat...
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: No need for that! This is more than perfect as it is!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Let's just dig in already! Then we can get back on the road! No need to waste more time on any extra steps!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...If you say so. Not my problem.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Well then, the Stir-fried Chili Originium Slug is done!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Hey, Big Beard, what're you doing?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Let me try something.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: These shells have been cleaned, right?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: What is he up to?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: We'll put the cleaned slug meat back into the shells, mince some garlic and add a little butter, salt, and pepper... And of course don't forget the missing step: drizzle the meat in some Originium slug beer.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Then, add a bit of minced garlic at the shells' openings...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And finally, put the shells back in the fire facing upwards and roast them for a while.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: The flames lick the Originium slug shells and give out an intense wheat aroma.
The oil sizzles as the warm scent of the garlic wafts toward the party.
Then, there is a light, joyful sound—
*crackle*
There we go! Now hurry and take them out.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I've got pancakes ready, too! Come on, let's eat!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Delicious!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Put the meat on the bread, and bite into it with the chilis. Then, take a sip of beer. Try it!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Here, try the pancakes! I added some fowlbeast eggs. You'll love it, guaranteed.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Is that colorful stuff on top crushed candies? It's sweet!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Fine, I'll try it too!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What's this?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Originium slug antennae.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Wow! So good! I like the chewy texture... but way too spicy! It's very different from Senshi's cooking, but still good!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hm... With the beer, the roast slug doesn't have that earthy taste at all, unlike the stir fry.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I knew it. The result is always better when you don't cut corners. Rushing will do you no good.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: No matter how minor a step is, we must take it carefully. That's what's so fascinating about cooking. Marcille, how anxious you were made me realize this.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hey, I wasn't!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'm not the kind of person who throws caution to the wind when I'm anxious! I'm only so worried because none of you seem to be!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's like none of you even want to get back as soon as possible...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: This beer is awesome! It's got a different malty taste to it, unlike anything I've ever had!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Well, that's good to hear. I was planning to bottle and sell it, so I brewed a couple batches. Sounds like I'll be raking in the dough.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Originium slug beer? Is it brewed with the slugs? How does that work?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: There are many ways. If you raise them in clean wheat husks from the moment they're born, the husks will stick to them, and eventually they'll form shells that keep the smell.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: And if you mix those shells into your brew's hops, this beer is what you'll get.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: A few other places do it differently. Say, feeding the slugs hops and using their mucus in the brew.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: I'm sure it'd taste different, but I like my brews the best!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: The same goes for the pancakes you just had. Give those shiny little fellas some fruit, and their shells will end up sweet.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Mmh... *burp*.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I guess I can relax now that I know there's a market for my beer.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: All of this is so good...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Anyway, I think Marcille's been so anxious because... we kind of stumbled our way into this place by accident.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: To be frank, most of what you guys have said has gone right over my head.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: *sigh*... Never mind. I guess we'll have to look elsewhere for answers.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Well, everyone gets homesick. I know that much at least.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: But I've never met anyone who knows as little as you guys. It's not safe, traveling like that... Take these with you.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Big Bob quickly packs up some prepared slug meat and beer and hands them over to Laios, along with a book.
Laios flips through the book and finds it filled with crooked, illegible letters.
What's this?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Heh, that's my 'Bob's Gourmet Guide.' I wrote down everything I've seen and whether it's edible or not.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Take it. You seem surprised by even the littlest things, so just follow what it says in the book. Don't starve or get yourselves food poisoning.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: ...Seems like this is right up Laios's alley.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I can picture the expression on his face without even looking.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Oh, right, I also know of this place that has... uh, a lot of eccentric people. I'm sure they'd be able to help you get home.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: I mean, they even got that red-eyed woman on a leash. If anyone can handle this, it's them.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Really? What's that place called?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: They've been opening branch offices in even the most remote villages. You should be able to find them pretty easily.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Okay. Rhodes Island. Got it.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Quietly) ...What a strange name for an island.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: (Quietly) Does that mean we'll need to board a ship...?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: If you do manage to find it, remember to say hello to Mudrock for me.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Not a problem.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Alright then. I hope you'll find them soon!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Thanks, big guy.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What an interesting bunch.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: I sure hope they'll find that... dungeon soon.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Ahem, now back to work!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Hm? What happened to the rest of the food?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Did they finish all of it...? Hm...
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: *burp*
Cooked Originium slug... yummy!
